mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodIemDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , GOD_IEM_CD , GOD_IEM_TURN , GOD_IEM_VAL_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_IEM_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_IEM_CD = #{godIemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_IEM_TURN = #{godIemTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
